1.0.name: wordpress/imdb-info-box
1.0.description:
This plugin helps to add movie information (from IMDB) in wordpress post using shortcode [imdb id="imdbmovieid"]. IMDB Info Box is using omdbapi.com API which provides information from Imdb.

Read more how this plugin works http://toolspot.org/get-movie-info-imdb.php

Note

This plugin is not endorsed by or affiliated with IMDb.com
